tasks.label: ConfigMaps
tasks.command: kubectl apply -f infrastructure/configMaps && kubectl apply -f infrastructure/configMaps-dev && kubectl apply -f monitoring/configMaps && kubectl apply -f monitoring/configMaps-dev

tasks.label: Secrets
tasks.command: kubectl apply -f infrastructure/secrets-dev && kubectl apply -f monitoring/secrets-dev

tasks.label: Build Grafana
tasks.command: eval $(minikube docker-env) && docker build monitoring -f monitoring/Dockerfile.grafana -t grafana-custom

tasks.label: Build User
tasks.command: eval $(minikube docker-env) && docker build frontend/user -f frontend/user/Dockerfile -t python-custom

tasks.label: Build Teacher
tasks.command: eval $(minikube docker-env) && docker build frontend/teacher-panel -f frontend/teacher-panel/Dockerfile -t node-custom

tasks.label: Deploy
tasks.command: kubectl apply -f infrastructure/k8s && kubectl apply -f monitoring/k8s && kubectl apply -f frontend.yaml

tasks.label: Helm Deploy Infrastructure
tasks.command: helm package -d infrastructure/helm infrastructure/helm/. && helm install infrastructure infrastructure/helm/infrastructure-0.1.0.tgz

tasks.label: Helm Deploy Monitoring
tasks.command: helm package -d monitoring/helm monitoring/helm/. && helm install monitoring monitoring/helm/monitoring-0.1.0.tgz

tasks.label: Helm Deploy Frontend
tasks.command: helm package -d frontend/helm frontend/helm/. && helm install frontend frontend/helm/frontend-0.1.0.tgz
